titleStmt.title: A commentary vpon the epistle of Saint Paule written to the Colossians. Preached by Thomas Cartwright, and now published for the further vse of the Church of God
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, and are to be sold by George Norton, dwelling neere Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks leaf M1; leaf 2I4 torn, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
